name: Aruba ClearPass
description: The Aruba ClearPass Orchestrator allows for the remote management of certificates in Aruba ClearPass Policy Manager. Inventory and Re-Enrollment (On Device Key Generation) functions are supported.

store_types.Name: Aruba
store_types.ClientMachineDescription: The base URL / IP address of the Aruba instance without the scheme. (i.e. my-server-name.com if the Aruba URL is https://my-server-name.com)
store_types.StorePathDescription: The server hostname that holds the certificate.

Properties.Name: ServiceName
Properties.Description: The type of service associated with the server. Each service has its own certificate.

Properties.Name: FileServerType
Properties.Description: The type of file server that the certificate will be uploaded to. The file server must be able to serve the file via HTTPS.

Properties.Name: FileServerHost
Properties.Description: Required. The base URL for the file server host without the scheme. (i.e. my-server-name.com if the file server URL is https://my-server-name.com). See File Server Configuration section in the orchestrator documentation for more details.

Properties.Name: FileServerUsername
Properties.Description: Optional. The username used to access the file server. See File Server Configuration section in the orchestrator documentation for more details.

Properties.Name: FileServerPassword
Properties.Description: Optional. The password used to access the file server. See File Server Configuration section in the orchestrator documentation for more details.

Properties.Name: DigestAlgorithm
Properties.Description: The hash digest algorithm used for the certificate signing request (CSR).
